title: Divine Sword Ward for 55 RP (if possible)
body:
Hello, I recently got Eternal Sword Master Yi Skin shard from a chest and after purchasing some chests I eventually got it. 
One of the chests, got me a Divine Sword Ward Skin Shard... It has to be destiny!!! They are from the same theme and I can't believe how lucky I am to have opened both of these goodies. 

However, I need 55 RP to buy a key and get some Orange Essence to make this ward my own. I know this isn't a guaranteed process and it is out of the goodness of Poros. 

If it is possible, may I get 55 RP for this humble drawing of the Divine Ward Skin that **missed **the bush when it was warded... 
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Destiny indeed, your drawing depicts the master's consecration of the war torn lands.  A divine drawing, friend.  :)  The poros may have run around your account and added the goodies.  :)

I am truly grateful. Thank you.
edit: a chest dropped a draven ward and I succeeded in getting my Divine Sword Ward Skin! I'm so happy :)
